channel.title: Perspective through the lense of Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA
channel.description: My research and analysis synthesizes global economics, politics, and policy as a macroeconomic analyst at the Dynamic Allocations Strategies team at William Blair.

item.title: Liberalizing Rent-Seeking - How Export Processing Zones Can Save or Sink an Economy
item.description: This paper presents export processing zones (EPZs) as a rent-seeking tool with the appearance of a development policy. My model indicates that EPZs do not benefit an economy via backward linkages but through marginal improvements to a countryâ€™s trade regime.
item.author: lotta@lottamoberg.com (Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA)
